ajxpdriver.name: webdav
ajxpdriver.label: WebDAV (PEAR)
ajxpdriver.description: Access a WebDAV server. Requires PEAR/HTTP_WebDAVClient installed with the patched found in the plugin folder applied.

param.name: HOST
param.label: Host
param.description: Host of the WebDAV server, with http/https and without trailing slash. Can contain user:password too.

param.name: PATH
param.label: Uri
param.description: Path to the root folder on the server

param.name: CHMOD_VALUE
param.label: File Creation Mask
param.description: Optionnaly apply a chmod operation. Value must be numeric, like 0777, 0644, etc.
